item.title: Endless Legend 2 demo out now on Steam, but only for a limited time
item.content:encoded:
Turn-based strategy game from Hooded Horse and Amplitude crosses 250,000 wishlists.

A demo for Hooded Horse and Amplitude's Endless Legend 2 is out now. The turn-based strategy sequel for PC can now be tried out ahead of its early access launch on September 22 - a release that has a good shot of being reasonably big, given the game has passed 250,000 wishlists on Steam.

Demo details:

  • Time limited, only remaining live until August 18
  • Play as the hardened Kin of Sheredyn or the harmonious Aspects factions
  • Wage war against the Necrophages
  • Explore the world of Saiadha across two tide-fall events, with a turn cap
  • Demo progress wonâ€™t be transferable to the full early access release

Full game details:

  • Five factions
  • Unlimited turns
  • Dive deep into the mysteries of the planet

Take a peek at what's on offer in the demo in this Endless Legend 2 demo trailer:

Endless Legend 2 is releasing for PC via Steam Early Access on September 22, 2025.
